_source.short_desc: Upper Hand is the leading provider of sports software that enables sports trainers and academies to achieve more while doing less.
_source.long_desc: Built for sports, Upper Hand streamlines registration, scheduling, billing and payments, athlete management, memberships, and more! Upper Hand is the perfect solution for camps and clinics, training programs, lessons, teams, and payment plans. Automate your marketing, gain valuable insights from reports, and manage coaches and trainers with ease.
_source.pricing_details: One plan, everything included. $95/m for annual billing (30% discount) or $135 for monthly billing.
_source.target_audience: Any sports organization that runs training - sports facilities, training academies, youth clubs, camp businesses, and more. Only software built specifically for sports training.

media.caption: Upper Hand provides your clients an intuitive checkout experience that increases customer satisfaction and drives repeat business.
Customizable calendar acts as your central hub, giving your staff one place to manage scheduling and availability, check-in clients, view upcoming session details, and transact.

Upper Hand empowers quicker and more informed business decisions through real-time data that?s accurate and accessible. Visualize business KPIs over time, discover buyer trends, & detect impending blockers to growth.

Flexible contact management and marketing tools help build your book of business while eliminating costs for third-party services. Maximize marketing ROI with contact reporting like heat maps, login dates, and purchasing trends.
Integrated software & payments platform eliminates need to aggregate data from multiple costly sources. Take quicker action on outstanding balances with integrated payment tools.

related_products.short_desc: More than 20,000 organizations are using SportsEngine HQ to find new members, raise funds, launch apparel stores, and collect fees.
related_products.features: Leagues, clubs, associations, tournaments, and teams of all sizes use SportsEngine HQ to manage their operations, run background screens, promote their competition programs, sign up members, communicate with parents & athletes, raise funds, and process payments. In addition to technology, SportsEngine provides professional support, consulting, and design services. SportsEngine is part of the NBC Sports Group.

related_products.short_desc: The most powerful sports platform with an all-in-one management software, custom website & app for your league, team or tournament.
related_products.features:
Run a sports league, team or tournament? Create a custom website and mobile app in minutes. 

Manage registrations, schedules, players, teams, stats and videos. Give players their own player profiles, team pages, season averages, rankings, leaderboards and chat + messaging. Wooter also includes 24/7 support. You can even order fully-custom uniforms and apparel right in your dashboard.

Starting your league, managing your team, or running your tournament has never been this easy!

related_products.short_desc: 25 million coaches, administrators, players and parents use TeamSnap to coordinate the team, the club and the season.
related_products.features: Our reimagined club solution builds on over a decade of delivering the easiest-to-use and most-intuitive team mobile app to 25M users and 19K organizations. We combine the top-rated team management app with registration, payments, communication, scheduling, and reporting to bring you a true all-in-one club solution. With the new TeamSnap for Clubs & Leagues, you have everything you need to manage your clubs and teams in a solution your administrators, coaches, managers, and parents will love.

related_products.short_desc: The fastest management software for your teams, club, or league. Create a website, register players, and send messages to participants.
related_products.features:
Jersey Watch is the fastest sports management software for your club or league. 

Our website builder allows you to build a page and promote your organization in minutes.

Set up online forms so players can easily register and make payments online. Sort and manage player info using our registration management feature.

Communicating with parents and coaches has never been easier. Use our messaging tools to send emails and texts with a few clicks to teams or your entire organization.

related_products.short_desc: Automate league management and streamline operations for your entire sports facility---from scheduling to billing to member profiles.
related_products.features: EZFacility's sports software goes beyond league management to streamline operations for your entire facility. Manage clients, rentals, tournaments, online registration, payments, & more. EZ's secure, state-of-the-art solution is the perfect fit for any league or sports facility. Whether you manage just one league---or multiple leagues with full membership options, clinics, facility rentals, special events, & more, EZFacility is your all-in-one sports facility management software!

related_products.short_desc: Swim team and meet management software that helps run summer and high school swim teams more efficiently from a central team website.
related_products.features: We simplify swim team and swim meet management: unifying everything you need to run a swim team into one powerful, web based, swim software solution. We save time, eliminate hassle, and run your swim team better. SwimTopia covers the needs of summer and high school swim teams: website hosting, online registration, online meet entries, team communication, volunteer management, merchandising, and fundraising. HyTek compatible and with an accompanying mobile app, SwimTopia has your team covered.

related_products.short_desc: GameDay caters to sport & event organisations of all sizes, from National Governing Bodies to Grassroots Clubs, Charities & Foundations
related_products.features:
GameDay, part of the Stack Sports family, have been providing digital solutions to the sports & events industry since 2001.

GameDay provides a range of solutions in membership management, competition/tournament management, event/ticketing solutions along with websites, eCommerce and online auction/fundraising. 

GameDay works with a variety of organisations including grassroots sports clubs/associations, professional clubs/teams, sport governing bodies, event providers, charities & foundations.

related_products.short_desc: The industry's leading operating system for youth and local sports.
related_products.features: LeagueApps is more than just sports management software. It's an entire operating system for your organization giving you the tools you need to launch, promote, manage, and grow your programs while putting your customers first. Growing your organization means managing your operations with efficiency. So we give you the tools to save you time and headaches so you can get back to doing what you love. Learn more about LeagueApps

related_products.short_desc: Our easy to use software is perfect for any Sports Organization. We offer top notch Customer Service, a robust platform, and more
related_products.features: TeamSideline will save you time and money managing your sports league. Our easy to use software has everything you need, all in one website. TeamSideline is a highly customizable system with Free Site Setup, Free Training and Free Customer Support -- schedule a free demo to get answers to your questions

related_products.short_desc: A powerful suite of products that simplify the business of managing competitive swim teams with registration, billing, entries, & more!

With over 4,000 swim teams, our systems serve around 1 million active administrators, parents, and swimmers worldwide. Every subscription includes 7 days-a-week support and unlimited free upgrades to our ever-growing and developing team management software suite.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Club Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Club Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Club Management software automates management functions including membership, fees, dues and other operations for fitness, social and civic clubs or other similar organizations. These applications offer integrated solutions for access management as well as sales and marketing tools for club facilities. Club Management solutions also help track business performances through automated reporting and forecasting on sales performance, member retention rates and revenue generation. Club Management software is related to Membership Management software, Visitor Management software, and Registration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.

_source.short_desc: We untangle the complexities behind running your business, empowering your team to deliver client outcomes that grow your bottom line.
_source.long_desc: Upper Hand is a leading provider of sports scheduling software - and the only that is solely focused on sports training. Sports facilities, sports academies, youth clubs, and camp businesses use Upper Hand to operate more efficiently, increase client satisfaction, and leverage real-time data for better decision-making. Key features include scheduling and registration, memberships, classes, payroll automation, retail management, payments and more - plus a top notch client experience.
_source.pricing_details: One plan, everything included. $95/m for annual billing (30% discount) or $135 for monthly billing.
_source.target_audience: Any sports organization that runs training - sports facilities, training academies, youth clubs, camp businesses, and more. Only software built specifically for sports training.

media.caption: Upper Hand provides your clients an intuitive checkout experience that increases customer satisfaction and drives repeat business.
Customizable calendar acts as your central hub, giving your staff one place to manage scheduling and availability, check-in clients, view upcoming session details, and transact.

Upper Hand empowers quicker and more informed business decisions through real-time data that?s accurate and accessible. Visualize business KPIs over time, discover buyer trends, & detect impending blockers to growth.

Flexible contact management and marketing tools help build your book of business while eliminating costs for third-party services. Maximize marketing ROI with contact reporting like heat maps, login dates, and purchasing trends.
Integrated software & payments platform eliminates need to aggregate data from multiple costly sources. Take quicker action on outstanding balances with integrated payment tools.

related_products.features: QuickBooks Time is a proud part of the QuickBooks family, seamlessly connecting with leading accounting tools like QuickBooks Online, ADP and more. Easily manage people, projects and payroll, all in one place

related_products.short_desc: Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders & payments using the worlds friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Meet the personal assistant for your schedule (only better) that works 24/7, behind the scenes to fill your calendar and take work off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Squarespace is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments so your day-to-day runs smoother even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your schedule, get booked 24/7, send automated reminders, manage memberships, securely process payments & more. Starts at $25/mo
related_products.features: Boost your productivity and free up time with Vagaro Salon, Spa & Fitness Appointment Scheduling Software. Schedule appointments from a desktop or use our App to manage clients on the go. Get booked on our marketplace, your booking page, Facebook, Yelp, Instagram or on your own website via our booking widget. Send automated reminders and emails. Securely process payments. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Pricing starts @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Stay organized and manage your team calendar efficiently with monday.com Work OS, a customizable work and project management platform.
related_products.features: Stay organized and manage your work calendar more efficiently with monday.com Work OS, a customizable work and project management platform. Improve productivity and teamwork by easily scheduling, assigning, and overseeing everyone's activities, tasks, deadlines, and events in one collaborative calendar. No-code automations and seamless integrations ensure faster workflows, visual boards allow for real-time collaboration, and dashboards give you an easy overview of progress and results.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.
related_products.features: Calendly makes scheduling meetings easy and efficient, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

related_products.short_desc: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks, like scheduling meetings, quick and easy.

The worlds leader in online scheduling, doodle.com is used by over 30 million people each month. Doodle AG is headquartered in Zurich.

Access your salon business anytime, anywhere, all on Booker's secure, cost-effective, cloud-based software.

related_products.short_desc: Setmore offers a free, online scheduling platform for you to connect with your customers.
related_products.features:
Setmore offers a free, online scheduling platform for you to connect with your customers. Manage all your appointments through one simple, sleek calendar system and give your business the freedom to grow. 

Bring on more customers and sharpen your brand image, while taking charge of your working hours. By listing your availability online, your customers can self-book their desired services. Focus on providing an excellent customer experience and let Setmore handle the paperwork.

related_products.short_desc: 7shifts is designed to simplify team management, one shift at a time. Start your free 14-day trial today!

Save 5 hours/week on scheduling, minimize call & text chaos by 70%, manage staff on the go with free mobile apps, and integrate everything into your existing POS and Payroll systems.

Join over 700,000+ restaurant pros who are using 7shifts to simplify their life.

related_products.short_desc: The fastest, easiest, and highest value service management software to automate everything from first customer contact to getting paid.

We provide our customers with mobile and online tools that are unmatched in performance, reliability, and functionality. We've packed the best tools into one extremely easy-to-use and affordable package that requires no big upfront investment. And we have in-house product experts to get you up and running immediately.

similar_products.short_desc: Smart, secure calendar sharing and booking for your entire organization.
similar_products.features:
Publish Your Calendars
Marketing events, training, webinars - whatever it is, easily manage your event calendars in Outlook and then publish them for everyone to see!

Bookings Made Easy

MyAvailability
Stop the email back-and-forth when trying to book meetings with external recipients; just send them your MyAvailability link and let them book the best time!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Scheduling software streamlines the process of scheduling clients, patients, and meetings. This type of software promotes efficiency by eliminating double-bookings and automating scheduling of recurring appointments. It also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and provide clients with the most suitable appointment options. Appointment Scheduling software often includes reminder tools that help ensure timely attendance of scheduled meetings and appointments. Appointment Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Medical Scheduling software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Calendar software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Calendar tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Calendar software helps attorneys to manage their schedules. These applications allow users to schedule events and appointments, set deadline reminders and notifies of any conflicts. Legal Calendar software is related to Court Management software, Law Practice Management software, Legal Billing software and Legal Case Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Planning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Planning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Planning software allows businesses to create timelines for project completion, allocate resources, assign tasks, and budget for project-related expenses.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scheduling software automates the scheduling of events, employees, rooms and other resources. Organizations use these applications to manage the planning of internal and external activities. Typically Scheduling software provides tools such as a shared calendar providing real-time project, task, employee and resource scheduling as well as a variety of forecasting, allocation and resource management features. Often other details, such as resource categorization, location details, timesheet records and employee skill-sets can be edited, updated and managed from the scheduling interface. Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Facility Management software and Appointment Scheduling software.
